generator.group: Australian Inherited Retinal Disease Registry and DNA Bank

publications.title: Generation of two induced pluripotent stem cell lines from a patient with dominant PRPF31 mutation and a related non-penetrant carrier

genomic_characterisation.summary: DNA was isolated using the FlexiGene DNA kit (QIAGEN). CNV analysis was performed on GenomeStudio 2.0 software using the CNVpartition 2.0 plugin (Illumina). To identify genomic alterations (deletions or duplications over 500 kb), B allele frequencies (Fig. 1C), LogR ratios and CNV values were
